[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/block/mod.rs] [HashValue key] [Collision resistance] Does the hash function provide sufficient collision resistance (256-bit), or can birthday attacks generate collisions? (Critical)

[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/quorum_certificate/mod.rs] [HashValue key] [Preimage attack] Can attackers find preimages for block hashes to create fake blocks that pass database lookups? (Critical)
[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/dag/mod.rs] [HashValue key] [Second preimage] Can attackers create a different certified node with the same hash as a legitimate one to replace it? (Critical)

[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/block/mod.rs] [HashValue encoding] [Byte order] Is HashValue serialization endian-independent, or can cross-platform validators disagree on key encoding? (High)
[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/mod.rs] [Column families] [CF isolation] Are column families properly isolated, or can data from one CF leak into another through implementation bugs? (High)
[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/mod.rs] [Column families] [CF deletion] Can column families be accidentally dropped, causing permanent loss of consensus data? (Critical)
[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/mod.rs] [Column families] [Deprecated CF] Is the 'ordered_anchor_id' deprecated CF properly handled, or can its presence cause security issues? (Low)

[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/mod.rs] [Column families] [CF creation race] Can race conditions during CF creation cause some validators to use different CF sets, fragmenting consensus? (High)
[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/mod.rs] [Error handling] [Panic vs Result] Do all schema operations return Results properly, or can panics crash validator nodes during consensus? (High)

[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/block/mod.rs] [Error handling] [Decode failure] What happens when Block decoding fails - does it cause validator halt or allow skipping corrupted blocks? (High)
[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/dag/mod.rs] [Error handling] [Vote decode error] Can malformed votes cause validators to skip valid consensus messages, degrading liveness? (Medium)

[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/quorum_certificate/mod.rs] [Error handling] [QC decode failure] Does QC decoding failure prevent block finalization, or can it be bypassed causing safety violations? (Critical)

[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/single_entry/mod.rs] [Error handling] [LastVote corruption] If LastVote data is corrupted, can validators recover or do they permanently lose safety guarantees? (Critical)
[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/single_entry/mod.rs] [Safety rules] [Vote replay] Can old LastVote data be restored to allow validators to vote again on already-voted blocks? (Critical)
[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/single_entry/mod.rs] [Safety rules] [Timeout bypass] Can timeout certificate data be manipulated to force premature round progression? (High)
[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/block/mod.rs] [Safety rules] [Block history rewrite] Can blocks be deleted and reinserted with modified content while keeping the same hash? (Critical)

[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/quorum_certificate/mod.rs] [Safety rules] [QC forgery] Can QCs be constructed without proper validator signatures by directly writing to the database? (Critical)
[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/dag/mod.rs] [Safety rules] [DAG manipulation] Can DAG structure be altered in the database to create alternative consensus histories? (Critical)
[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/mod.rs] [Performance] [Database bloat] Can attackers cause unbounded database growth by inserting malicious consensus data? (Medium)
[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/block/mod.rs] [Performance] [Large blocks] Can extremely large serialized blocks cause memory exhaustion when loaded from database? (Medium)
[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/dag/mod.rs] [Performance] [Vote spam] Can attackers spam the vote database with invalid votes causing storage exhaustion? (Medium)
[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/quorum_certificate/mod.rs] [Performance] [QC duplication] Can duplicate QCs for the same block accumulate, wasting storage space? (Low)
[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/mod.rs] [Migration] [Backward compatibility] Are schema changes backward compatible, or can upgrades break old validators reading the same database? (High)
[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/block/mod.rs] [Migration] [Block format evolution] Can Block structure changes cause old blocks to become unreadable, losing consensus history? (High)
[File: consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/dag/mod.rs] [Migration] [DAG schema changes] How are DAG schema migrations handled during protocol upgrades without losing existing DAG data? (High)
